originalText.text: Outstanding and very happy to have met, Dr George was professional, caring, and thorough. As I had a complex hernia, we choose to travel to NY from Miami for the robotic procedure. From the initial appointment to the pre & post operation, Dr George and his staff treated me well. His nurses, internal staff as well as interns all on point, could not ask for a better team.

text.text: Outstanding and very happy to have met, Dr George was professional, caring, and thorough. As I had a complex hernia, we choose to travel to NY from Miami for the robotic procedure. From the initial appointment to the pre & post operation, Dr George and his staff treated me well. His nurses, internal staff as well as interns all on point, could not ask for a better team.

originalText.text: Dr. George and his Staff did a great job in treating my Inquinal Hernia. The Pre-Op, the Surgery and Post Op all went well. Also, the Staff were all very informative and responsive.

text.text: Dr. George and his Staff did a great job in treating my Inquinal Hernia. The Pre-Op, the Surgery and Post Op all went well. Also, the Staff were all very informative and responsive.

originalText.text: Poor experience.  Found the office messy and unorganized in follow up and communication.  Dr. George was nice enough, but he told me his plan for treatment, and never followed through.  And he ignored my messages as well on the app.  Found my visit to be a waste of time sadly.  Wouldn't recommend, there are better doctors at Columbia

originalText.text: Being young and needing a surgery was not the easiest thing for me personally but having a doctor like Dr. Philip George and his team were wonderful. I felt educated and comforted every step of the way and trusted all of their advice on how to proceed post surgery. He found more than expected during the procedure and yet I was still able to start walking without pain after 2 days. I would recommend anyone needing hernia repair to see him since he really knows what he's doing.

originalText.text: I recommend Dr. George for your hernia surgery. He is skilled and highly professional. I had never had surgery before, and he took the time to explain everything that I might expect. My procedure went off without a hitch and now I am fully recovered. Highly recommended.
